result.post: is a blood-borne pathogen that is known to be

result.pre: known to be transmitted by infected mosquitoes. Although mosquitoes transmit
result.post: to and acquire it from humans primarily through blood

result.pre: our experiments mimicking natural settings demonstrate that mosquitoes may acquire
result.post: from human urinal discharge and sewage during breeding. Our

result.pre: conclusions are supported by several lines of laboratory evidence. First,
result.post: may survive for up to 8 h in harsh environments,
